title: Fruity Moroccan-Style Chicken Stew with Rice
ingredients: ['125ml soy sauce', '125ml fresh lemon juice', '125ml sherry', '125ml honey', '1/2 teaspoon ground thyme', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1.35kg chicken pieces, cut up', '285g uncooked brown rice', '750ml water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '8 pitted prunes', '8 dried apricot']
